Title: The Trouble with Doubles
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Holly Schlesinger
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Bob and Linda get trapped in an Escape Room while on a double date with another couple. Meanwhile, Louise hosts a zombie-movie night, but Tina takes charge when the zombies prove to be too scary.
